filmDetails.title: Children of the Sea
filmDetails.subtitle: Motion Picture Series
filmDetails.directorNote: I will answer one question - what is the essence of this publication; in other words, the question of what this publication will grow to become.

interviews.title: Raising a Child
interviews.subtitle: With Gitanjali J Angmo
interviews.text: Whose woods these are I think I know His house is in the village though He will not see me stopping here To watch his woods fill up with snow

interviews.title: Living Simply
interviews.subtitle: With Sonam Wangchuk
interviews.text: My little horse must think it queer To stop without a farmhouse near Between the woods and frozen lake The darkest evening of the year

interviews.title: The Market and Heart
interviews.subtitle: With Jay Jayshankar
interviews.text: He gives his harness bells a shake To ask if there is some mistake The only other sound's the sweep Of easy wind and donwy flake

writing.title: Directing your First Film
writing.subtitle: Written by Arya
writing.text: The woods are lovely, dark and deep But I have promises to keep And miles to go before I sleep And miles to go before I sleep
